dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 4306 IH: Advisory Committee on Minority Veterans Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Meng introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To make permanent the Advisory Committee on Minority Veterans.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Advisory Committee on Minority Veterans Act of 2015.

section.header: Advisory Committee on Minority Veterans made permanent
section.text: Section 544 of title 38 of the United States Code is amended by striking (e) The Committee shall cease to exist December 31, 2016..
